010-02794-01.productName: Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Corepack with SmartPump v2
010-02794-01.globalProductName: Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Corepack with SmartPump v2 with GHC™ 50
010-02794-01.pvName: Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Corepack with SmartPump v2 With GHC™ 50 Autopilot Instrument

seo.title: Garmin Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Corepack with SmartPump v2 with GHC™ 50
seo.ogDescription: Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Corepack with SmartPump v2 is a hydraulic autopilot designed for powerboats featuring corepack compatibility, and simple calibration.

defaultImage.altTag: Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Corepack with SmartPump v2

overviewTab.title: Overview

inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box
inTheBoxTab.content:
• Reactor 40 CCU (Course Computer Unit)
  • GHC™ 50 helm control display
  • NMEA 2000® drop cables (2 metres)
  • NMEA 2000 power cable
  • NMEA 2000 T-connectors
  • Buzzer
  • Male and female terminators
  • Interconnect cable
  • ECU (Electronic Control Unit) power cable
  • Shadow Drive
  • SmartPump v2
  • Documentation

specsTab.title: Specs
specsTab.content:
CCU Specifications

  • Dimensions: 3 19/32" diameter (91.4 mm)
  • Weight: 5.6 oz (159 g)
  • Temperature range: From 5°F to 131°F (from -15°C to 55°C)
  • Case material: Fully gasketed, high-impact plastic, waterproof to IEC 529 IPX7 standards
  • CCU cable length: 9.5 ft (3 m)
  • NMEA 2000 power input: 9-16 V
  • NMEA 2000 LEN: 3 (150 mA)

Buzzer/Alarm Specifications

  • Dimensions (L x Diameter): 29/32" x 1" (23 mm x 25 mm)
  • Weight: 2.4 oz (68 g)
  • Temperature range: from 5°F to 131°F (from -15°C to 55°C)
  • Cable length: 10 ft (3.0 m)
  • Dimensions (W x H x D): 7.5" x 7.75" x 9.625" (19 x 19.7 x 24.4 cm)
  • Weight: 16.5 lbs (7.5 kg)
  • Temperature range: From 5°F to 131°F (from -15°C to 55°C)
  • Material: Electronics Control Unit (ECU) - fully gasketed, aluminium alloy; bracket - carbon steel; manifold - aluminium alloy; motor - aluminium alloy
  • Power cable length: 9 ft (2.7 m)
  • Power input: 11.5-30 Vdc
  • Fuse: 40 A, blade-type
  • Main power usage: standby - less than 1 A; engaged - 5-10 A; peak - 34 A
  • Flow rate: Configurable from 0 to 2.4 L per minute
  • Compatible with steering cylinder sizes from 4-24 cu in; 7 second lock to lock up to 17 cu in

GHC 50 Specifications
